phrase: It's never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

phrase: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
author: Isaiah 41:10

phrase: There is hope for your future.
author: Jeremiah 31:17

phrase: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Alan Alexander Milne

phrase: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walter Disney

phrase: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

phrase: Be positive, patient, and persistent. Never give up.
author: Philip Mantofa

phrase: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
author: Michael Jackson

phrase: If I knew the world was ending tomorrow, I would still plant a tree today.
author: Martin Luther King

phrase: Whoever conceals their sins does not prosper, but the one who confesses and renounces them finds mercy.
author: Proverbs 28:13

phrase: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
author: 1 John 1:9

phrase: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
author: Psalm 118:24

phrase: The Lord will keep you from all harm—he will watch over your life; the Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.
author: Psalm 121:7-8

phrase: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
author: Matthew 7:7

phrase: Life is an opportunity, benefit from it.
author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

phrase: If you don't lose, you can't enjoy the victories.
author: Rafael Nadal

phrase: No matter how many times you fall, what matters is getting up one more time.
author: Fernando Alonso

phrase: Every sunrise is a blessing, an opportunity to start anew and do your best.
author: Keanu Reeves

phrase: I'm not designed to be second or third, I'm designed to win.
author: Ayrton Senna

phrase: Don't worry about anything; instead, pray about everything. Tell God what you need and thank Him for all He has done.
author: Philippians 4:6

phrase: Our steps are made firm by the Lord, He delights in our ways; though we stumble, we shall not fall, for He holds us by the hand.
author: Psalm 37:22-23

phrase: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

phrase: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: A guaranteed way to be miserable is to spend all your time trying to make everyone else happy.
author: Larry Winget

phrase: A man wrapped up in himself makes a very small bundle.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
author: Mary Kay Ash

phrase: A strong foundation at home sets you up for a strong foundation at work.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Accept the challenges so you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
author: George S. Patton

phrase: Accept your teammates for what they are and inspire them to become all they can be.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

phrase: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

phrase: Aim for the moon. If you miss you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

phrase: All great thinkers are initially ridiculed – and eventually revered.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: All of your dreams await just on the other side of your fears.
author: Grant Cardone

phrase: Always choose the future over the past. What do we do now?
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
author: Og Mandino

phrase: Always give without remembering and always receive without forgetting.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

phrase: An attitude of a positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Anger is never without a reason, but seldom with a good one.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Any fool can criticize, condemn and complain - and most fools do.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Any thought or action that you repeat over and over will eventually become a new habit.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
author: John Dewey

phrase: As we each express our natural genius, we all elevate our world.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

phrase: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

phrase: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

phrase: Become a person who would attract the results you seek.
author: Jim Cathcart

phrase: Before you begin scrambling up the ladder of success, make sure that it is leaning against the right building.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful, that's what matters to me.
author: Steve Jobs

phrase: Belief triggers the power to do.
author: David J. Schwartz

phrase: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

phrase: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
author: Christopher Morley

phrase: Business is like riding a bicycle. Either you keep moving or you fall down.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

phrase: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Change is hardest at the beginning, messiest in the middle and best at the end.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Clarity precedes mastery. Craft clear and precise plans/goals/deliverables. And then block out all else.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Courage is not absence of fear; it is control of fear, mastery of fear.
author: Mark Twain

phrase: Crush your fears with ACTION.
author: Russell Frazier

phrase: Daily exercise is an insurance policy against future illness. The best Leaders Without Titles are the fittest.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Deserve your dream.
author: Octavio Paz

phrase: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

phrase: Discipline is what you must have to resist the lure of excuses.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

phrase: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

phrase: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
author: Albert Schweitzer

phrase: Do whatever you do intensely.
author: Robert Henri

phrase: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
author: Thomas Jefferson

phrase: Doing the difficult things that you’ve never done awakens the talents you never knew you had.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Don’t be afraid to go out on a limb. That’s where the fruit is.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

phrase: Don’t settle for anything less than excellence.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

phrase: Don't fight the problem, decide it.
author: George C. Marshall

phrase: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
author: Christopher Reeve

phrase: Don't mistake movement for achievement.
author: Jim Rohn

phrase: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

phrase: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

phrase: Dream big dreams! Imagine that you have no limitations and then decide what's right before you decide what's possible.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Education is the beginning of transformation. Dedicate yourself to daily learning via books/audios/seminars and coaching.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.
author: Jim Rohn

phrase: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
author: Philip Sidney

phrase: Either move or be moved.
author: Ezra Pound

phrase: Either write something worth reading, or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

phrase: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

phrase: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
author: Victor Kiam

phrase: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

phrase: Every choice you make has an end result.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
author: Tom Stoppard

phrase: Every goal can be achieved if you break it down into enough small parts.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Every moment in front of a customer is a gorgeous opportunity to live your values.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: Every single person in the world could be a genius at something, if they practiced it daily for at least ten years.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Everything you do is triggered by an emotion of either desire or fear.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.
author: Jack Canfield

phrase: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

phrase: Excellence in one area is the beginning of excellence in every area.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Excellence is a not a skill. It's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

phrase: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

phrase: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

phrase: Fear and self-doubt have always been the greatest enemies of human potential.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Fear doesn’t exist anywhere except in the mind.
author: Dale Carnegie

phrase: Fear is 100% dependent on you for its survival.
author: Steve Maraboli

phrase: Fear is the destroyer of dreams and the killer of ambitions.
author: Jeffrey Benjamin

phrase: Focus your mind on the good versus the lack.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: For every sale you miss because you are too enthusiastic, you will miss a hundred because you are not enthusiastic enough.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: Freedom is not something you buy but something you earn.
author: Grant Cardone

phrase: Future intent influences and often determines present actions.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: Give yourself something to work toward constantly.
author: Mary Kay Ash

phrase: Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

phrase: Go the extra mile. There's no one on it!
author: Grant Cardone

phrase: Go where no one’s gone and leave a trail of excellence behind you.
author: Robin Sharma

phrase: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
author: Brian Tracy
